mapper.select:
select s.id subscriptionId,p.id planId, p.product_code, s.name productName,p.name planName,p.price planPrice,s.bill_calendar,s.recent_plan_price, s.status,s.remark,s.starts_at,s.ends_at,s.canceled_at,s.trial_period_start_at,s.trial_period_end_at,seller.handle sellerHandle,seller.customer_id sellerUserId,seller.brand_name sellerName,seller.avator sellerAvatar from subscription s inner join subs_plan p on s.plan_id=p.id inner join brand seller on s.seller_brand_id=seller.id
1=1 and s.subscriber_fid=#{buyer_brand_id} and s.subscriber_type='1'
AND (locate(#{dto.q}, seller.brand_name)>0 or locate(#{dto.q}, s.name)>0 or locate(#{dto.q}, p.name)>0 )
AND s.status=#{dto.tag}
order by s.create_at desc
